products.title: Developer T-Shirt
products.excerpt: Premium cotton t-shirt with clean minimalist design
products.description: 100% organic cotton developer t-shirt. Soft, pre-washed, and designed for comfort during long coding sessions. Available in S/M/L/XL.

products.title: Piano Sheet Music Collection
products.excerpt: Digital collection of 50+ piano pieces from classical to contemporary
products.description: Comprehensive digital sheet music collection featuring classical masterpieces, jazz standards, and contemporary arrangements. High-quality PDF format, instant download.

products.title: Code Architecture Poster
products.excerpt: Beautiful visualization of modern software architecture patterns
products.description: A2 size poster showcasing elegant software architecture patterns. Perfect for your home office or workspace. High-quality print on premium paper.

products.title: Developer's Notebook
products.excerpt: Premium lined notebook for sketches, algorithms, and ideas
products.description: 120 pages of high-quality paper with custom grid pattern perfect for wireframes and algorithms. Hardcover with elastic closure.

products.title: JavaScript Fundamentals Course
products.excerpt: Complete JavaScript course from basics to advanced concepts
products.description: Comprehensive 8-hour video course covering JavaScript fundamentals, ES6+, async programming, and modern development practices. Includes hands-on projects and lifetime access.

products.title: Tech Stack Stickers Pack
products.excerpt: Set of 20 high-quality stickers featuring popular programming languages and tools
products.description: Waterproof vinyl stickers featuring logos of React, Node.js, Python, Docker, and more. Perfect for laptops, water bottles, or anywhere you want to show your tech passion.

products.title: Piano Practice Tracker
products.excerpt: Digital practice journal template for serious piano students
products.description: Printable PDF practice tracker with weekly goals, repertoire lists, technique exercises, and progress monitoring. Designed by a professional pianist.

products.title: Code & Coffee Mug
products.excerpt: Ceramic mug with programming humor and elegant design
products.description: 11oz ceramic mug with heat-changing design that reveals code snippets when hot liquid is added. Dishwasher and microwave safe. Perfect for your daily coding fuel.

products.title: Web Development Cheat Sheet Set
products.excerpt: Quick reference guides for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more
products.description: Professionally designed cheat sheets for web development. Includes HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, React, and Git commands. High-resolution PDFs for printing or digital use.

products.title: Mechanical Keyboard Wrist Rest
products.excerpt: Ergonomic memory foam wrist rest for comfortable typing
products.description: Premium memory foam wrist rest with non-slip base. Designed for mechanical keyboards and long coding sessions. Breathable fabric cover, easy to clean.
